author: amaltaro
body:
Changes required by: https://github.com/dmwm/WMCore/pull/10485

Summary of changes is:
* created a new python2 spec file for the CMSCouchapp third-party library (from https://github.com/amaltaro/couchapp)
* replace the old `couchapp` dependency in CouchDB by this new spec
* remove the old and no longer maintained couchapp.spec and its dependency py2-restkit.spec
title: Create PY2 CMSCouchapp spec; remove old couchapp/restkit specs
